# Technical Specification Document
## PlayWise Core Software Platform v1.0

### 1. Overview
The PlayWise Core Software Platform serves as the foundation for the educational toy system, integrating conversation capabilities, learning assessment, and parent dashboard functionality. This platform enables age-appropriate educational interactions while tracking and adapting to each child's learning progress.

### 2. Requirements

#### 2.1 Functional Requirements
- Age-adaptive conversation system with multiple interaction modes
- Real-time learning assessment and progress tracking
- Parent dashboard for monitoring and customization
- Educational content management system
- Hardware integration capabilities
- Multi-user session management
- Data persistence and analytics

#### 2.2 Technical Requirements
- High availability (99.9% uptime)
- Response time < 500ms for conversation interactions
- Secure data storage and transmission
- Scalable to handle 100,000+ concurrent users
- Cross-platform compatibility
- Offline functionality for core features

### 3. Technical Details

#### 3.1 Architecture
```
/playwise-core
├── /core
│   ├── conversation_engine/
│   ├── age_detection/
│   └── session_manager/
├── /topics
│   ├── math/
│   ├── science/
│   └── stories/
├── /assessment
│   ├── progress_tracker/
│   └── difficulty_adjuster/
├── /dashboard
│   ├── parent_interface/
│   └── analytics/
├── /api
│   ├── external/
│   └── internal/
└── /tests
```

#### 3.2 Technology Stack
- Backend: Python 3.9+ with FastAPI
- Database: PostgreSQL 13+
- Cache: Redis 6+
- Container: Docker
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions
- Testing: pytest
- API Documentation: OpenAPI/Swagger

#### 3.3 Key Components
1. Conversation Engine
   - NLP processing pipeline
   - Age-appropriate response generator
   - Context management
   - Mode switching logic

2. Learning Assessment
   - Real-time progress tracking
   - Adaptive difficulty adjustment
   - Interest detection algorithms
   - Performance analytics

3. Parent Dashboard
   - User authentication
   - Activity monitoring
   - Customization interface
   - Progress reporting

### 4. Implementation Plan

#### 4.1 Phase 1 (Weeks 1-4)
- Repository setup and CI/CD pipeline
- Core conversation engine implementation
- Basic topic module system
- Initial test framework

#### 4.2 Phase 2 (Weeks 5-8)
- Learning assessment integration
- Database schema implementation
- Session management system
- Basic parent dashboard

#### 4.3 Phase 3 (Weeks 9-12)
- Advanced topic modules
- Analytics implementation
- Hardware integration
- Security hardening

### 5. Success Criteria

#### 5.1 Technical Metrics
- API response time < 500ms for 95% of requests
- Test coverage > 80%
- Zero critical security vulnerabilities
- Successful CI/CD pipeline execution

#### 5.2 Functional Metrics
- Accurate age-appropriate responses > 90%
- Learning progress tracking accuracy > 95%
- Parent dashboard accessibility > 99.9%
- Successful topic switching < 1s

#### 5.3 User Experience Metrics
- Conversation naturalness rating > 4/5
- Parent satisfaction rating > 4/5
- Learning effectiveness improvement > 25%
- System reliability rating > 4.5/5

### 6. Monitoring and Maintenance

#### 6.1 Monitoring
- Real-time performance metrics
- Error tracking and logging
- User interaction analytics
- System health dashboards

#### 6.2 Maintenance
- Weekly security updates
- Monthly feature updates
- Quarterly performance reviews
- Continuous user feedback integration

### 7. Security Considerations

#### 7.1 Data Protection
- End-to-end encryption
- Secure user authentication
- GDPR compliance
- Regular security audits

#### 7.2 Access Control
- Role-based access management
- API key authentication
- Session token management
- Rate limiting

This technical specification provides a comprehensive framework for implementing the PlayWise Core Software Platform. Regular reviews and updates will ensure alignment with project goals and evolving requirements.
